The dynamics of change in the state of health of children affected by the Chernobyl accident in all three countries - Belarus , Russia , and Ukraine - in the post-accident period is characterized by persistent negative tendencies : the morbidity rate is going up , the number of really healthy children is dropping , and disability is increasing . From Friday 's Daily Star	IN NNP POS NNP NNP
By Juan Cole	IN NNP NNP
Friday , June 04 , 2004	NNP , NNP CD , CD
As the American public gradually wearies of the Iraq crisis , some have begun worrying that the war could blow back on the US by creating the conditions for anti-American terrorism .	IN DT JJ NN RB VBZ IN DT NNP NN , DT VBP VBN VBG IN DT NN MD VB RB IN DT NNP IN VBG DT NNS IN JJ NN .
Israel , however , is much closer to Iraq and is likely to suffer from Iraqi instability much more acutely than will the United States .	NNP , RB , VBZ RB JJR IN NNP CC VBZ JJ TO VB IN JJ NN RB RBR RB IN MD DT NNP NNP .
Ironically , among the strongest proponents of war in Iraq were Israeli Prime Minister Ariel Sharon and his neoconservative supporters in the US .	RB , IN DT JJS NNS IN NN IN NNP VBD JJ NNP NNP NNP NNP CC PRP$ JJ NNS IN DT NNP .
Have they , however , actually weakened Israeli security ?	VBP PRP , RB , RB VBN JJ NN .
The biggest threat Israel faces is not from conventional armies but from the asymmetrical tactics of Palestinian national liberation movements .	DT JJS NN NNP VBZ VBZ RB IN JJ NNS CC IN DT JJ NNS IN JJ JJ NN NNS .
The derailing of the Oslo peace process by the hard - line policies of Sharon and the Palestinian intifada has encouraged suicide bombings .	DT NN IN DT NNP NN NN IN DT JJ HYPH NN NNS IN NNP CC DT JJ NN VBZ VBN NN NNS .
This , in turn , has discouraged international investment in Israel and has made it less likely that immigrants to the country will actually remain there .	DT , IN NN , VBZ VBN JJ NN IN NNP CC VBZ VBN PRP RBR JJ IN NNS IN DT NN MD RB VB RB .
Although Israel withdrew from Lebanese territory in May 2000 , the radical Lebanese Shiite party , Hizbullah , has not been mollified .	IN NNP VBD IN JJ NN IN NNP CD , DT JJ JJ JJ NN , NNP , VBZ RB VBN VBN .
It is estimated to have some 5,000 armed fighters , and they have pursued attacks against Israeli forces to compel them to withdraw from the Shebaa Farms , a sliver of Syrian territory that Israel annexed after the 1967 war .	PRP VBZ VBN TO VB DT CD JJ NNS , CC PRP VBP VBN NNS IN JJ NNS TO VB PRP TO VB IN DT NNP NNPS , DT NN IN JJ NN WDT NNP VBD IN DT CD NN .
Any thorough assessment of the impact of the Iraq war and its aftermath on Israel 's security environment must , therefore , closely examine its likely effect on the conduct of asymmetrical warfare .	DT JJ NN IN DT NN IN DT NNP NN CC PRP$ NN IN NNP POS NN NN MD , RB , RB VB PRP$ JJ NN IN DT NN IN JJ NN .
Although it is often alleged ( without much evidence ) that Saddam Hussein gave money to the families of Palestinian suicide bombers and so encouraged asymmetrical warfare , it is not clear that he actually posed a danger to Israel .	IN PRP VBZ RB VBN -LRB- IN JJ NN -RRB- IN NNP NNP VBD NN IN DT NNS IN JJ NN NNS CC RB VBD JJ NN , PRP VBZ RB JJ IN PRP RB VBD DT NN IN NNP .
The Palestinians who have been willing to kill themselves to end the Israeli occupation of the Gaza Strip and the West Bank were not driven by economic considerations .	DT NNPS WP VBP VBN JJ TO VB PRP TO VB DT JJ NN IN DT NNP NNP CC DT NNP NNP VBD RB VBN IN JJ NNS .
Saddam never did anything practical to help the Palestinians .	NNP RB VBD NN JJ TO VB DT NNPS .
At some points , as in the late 1980s , he reportedly made behind - the - scenes overtures to the Israelis to arrive at some sort of a deal .	IN DT NNS , IN IN DT JJ NNS , PRP RB VBD IN HYPH DT HYPH NNS NNS IN DT NNPS TO VB IN DT NN IN DT NN .
He did not allow Palestinian radicals to launch operations against Israel from Iraq .	PRP VBD RB VB JJ NNS TO VB NNS IN NNP IN NNP .
By the late 1990s , Iraq had no nuclear or biological weapons program , and had destroyed its chemical weapons stockpiles .	IN DT JJ NNS , NNP VBD DT JJ CC JJ NNS NN , CC VBD VBN PRP$ JJ NNS NNS .
Its ramshackle army had virtually collapsed before the American invasion in 2003 .	PRP$ JJ NN VBD RB VBN IN DT JJ NN IN CD .
If it is hard to see how Baathist Iraq posed any real threat to Israel , it is not so difficult to see a menace in the current instability .	IN PRP VBZ JJ TO VB WRB JJ NNP VBD DT JJ NN IN NNP , PRP VBZ RB RB JJ TO VB DT NN IN DT JJ NN .
The bungling of post-war Iraq by the Bush administration created a weak and failed state .	DT NN IN JJ NNP IN DT NNP NN VBD DT JJ CC VBN NN .
Armed militias , many staffed by former Iraqi military men with substantial training and experience , have proliferated .	JJ NNS , JJ VBN IN JJ JJ JJ NNS IN JJ NN CC NN , VBP VBN .
The US chose to ally itself with such groups as the Supreme Council for the Islamic Revolution in Iraq , whose 15,000 - strong Badr Corps paramilitary was trained by the Iranian Revolutionary Guards .	DT NNP VBD TO VB PRP IN JJ NNS IN DT NNP NNP IN DT NNP NNP IN NNP , WP$ CD HYPH JJ NNP NNP NN VBD VBN IN DT NNP NNP NNPS .
Anti-Israeli and pro-Palestinian feeling is strong among several major Iraqi ideological groups and currents .	JJ CC JJ NN VBZ JJ IN JJ JJ JJ JJ NNS CC NNS .
The more radical Shiites , who generally follow the theocratic notions of Iran 's Ayatollah Ruhollah Khomeini , routinely chant and demonstrate against Israel .	DT RBR JJ NNPS , WP RB VBP DT JJ NNS IN NNP POS NNP NNP NNP , RB VBP CC VBP IN NNP .
They vehemently protested the Israeli assassination of Sheikh Ahmed Yassin , the leader of Hamas , last March .	PRP RB VBD DT JJ NN IN NNP NNP NNP , DT NN IN NNP , JJ NNP .
Worse for Israel , the assassination drew a denunciation even from the moderate and cautious Grand Ayatollah Ali Sistani , who wields enormous moral authority over Iraqi Shiites .	JJR IN NNP , DT NN VBD DT NN RB IN DT JJ CC JJ NNP NNP NNP NNP , WP VBZ JJ JJ NN IN JJ NNPS .
These Shiite movements had been suppressed by Saddam Hussein 's regime , but have now organized and armed themselves .	DT JJ NNS VBD VBN VBN IN NNP NNP POS NN , CC VBP RB VBN CC VBN PRP .
They have also reestablished their historical links with Lebanese and Iranian Shiites .	PRP VBP RB VBN PRP$ JJ NNS IN JJ CC JJ NNPS .
It is inevitable that most Iraqi Shiites will side with their Hizbullah coreligionists against Israel , and it seems likely that Iraqi Shiites will get rich enough from Iraqi petroleum sales in the future that they will be in a good position to bankroll Lebanese Shiite radicals .	PRP VBZ JJ IN JJS JJ NNPS MD VB IN PRP$ NNP NNS IN NNP , CC PRP VBZ JJ IN JJ NNPS MD VB JJ RB IN JJ NN NNS IN DT NN IN PRP MD VB IN DT JJ NN TO VB JJ JJ NNS .
Sunni Arab fundamentalists deeply sympathize with the Palestinians and with Hamas , and those in Iraq have deep historical inks with fundamentalists in Jordan and Palestine .	JJ JJ NNS RB VBP IN DT NNPS CC IN NNP , CC DT IN NNP VBP VBN JJ NNS IN NNS IN NNP CC NNP .
Iraqi cities such as Fallujah and Ramadi were on the truck route from Amman to Baghdad , and so came under the influence of the Salafi movement , which is popular in Jordan .	JJ NNS JJ IN NNP CC NNP VBD IN DT NN NN IN NNP IN NNP , CC RB VBD IN DT NN IN DT NNP NN , WDT VBZ JJ IN NNP .
Secular Arab nationalist groups also universally sympathize with the Palestinians , and those in post-Saddam Iraq are no exception .	JJ JJ NN NNS RB RB VBP IN DT NNPS , CC DT IN JJ NNP VBP DT NN .
Whereas Saddam Hussein 's dictatorship ensured that such populist currents were kept firmly under control , they are now free to organize .	IN NNP NNP POS NN VBD IN JJ JJ NNS VBD VBN RB IN NN , PRP VBP RB JJ TO VB .
An Iraq in which armed fundamentalist and nationalist militias proliferate is inevitably a security worry for Israel .	DT NNP IN WDT JJ JJ CC JJ NNS VBP VBZ RB DT NN NN IN NNP .
If even a modicum of normality and security can be returned to Iraq , its citizens will be able to benefit from the country 's petroleum reserves .	IN RB DT NN IN NN CC NN MD VB VBN IN NNP , PRP$ NNS MD VB JJ TO VB IN DT NN POS NN NNS .
That private wealth can easily be funneled into aid for the Palestinians and for Lebanese Shiites .	DT JJ NN MD RB VB VBN IN NN IN DT NNPS CC IN JJ NNPS .
Israel 's security interests are best served by peace with its neighbors , which can only be achieved by trading land for peace with the Palestinians .	NNP POS NN NNS VBP RBS VBN IN NN IN PRP$ NNS , WDT MD RB VB VBN IN VBG NN IN NN IN DT NNPS .
Ariel Sharon 's aggressive near annexation of almost half of the occupied West Bank and his indefinite postponement of any Palestinian state have created unprecedented rage and violence .	NNP NNP POS JJ JJ NN IN RB NN IN DT VBN NNP NNP CC PRP$ JJ NN IN DT JJ NN VBP VBN JJ NN CC NN .
The anger has spread throughout the Muslim world , including Iraq .	DT NN VBZ VBN IN DT JJ NN , VBG NNP .
The promotion by the pro-Zionist right of twin occupations - in the West Bank and in Iraq - has profoundly weakened , not strengthened , Israeli security .	DT NN IN DT JJ NN IN NN NNS , IN DT NNP NNP CC IN NNP , VBZ RB VBN , RB VBN , JJ NN .

Apart from the 1,200 Indian lives lost in 1987 , the Indian peacekeeping force was immensely unpopular not only in Tamil Nadu and the Jaffna peninsula but also among the Sinhalese majority who considered it a violation of their country 's sovereignty . India defensive over Sri Lanka	NNP JJ IN NNP NNP
By Ranjit Devraj	IN NNP NNP
NEW DELHI -	NNP NNP ,
While India is ready to enter into a " defense cooperation agreement " with Sri Lanka , it is wary of being drawn into any military involvement in the island nation 's two decades - old civil war that has seen violent strife between ethnic Tamils and the Sinhalese majority - leaving over 60,000 dead on both sides .	IN NNP VBZ JJ TO VB IN DT `` NN NN NN '' IN NNP NNP , PRP VBZ JJ IN VBG VBN IN DT JJ NN IN DT NN NN POS CD NNS HYPH JJ JJ NN WDT VBZ VBN JJ NN IN JJ NNPS CC DT JJ NN , VBG RB CD JJ IN DT NNS .
And that explains the delay in the signing of a formal defense agreement that was at the heart of Sri Lankan President Chandrika Kumaratunga 's four - day visit to India recently .	CC DT VBZ DT NN IN DT NN IN DT JJ NN NN WDT VBD IN DT NN IN JJ JJ NNP NNP NNP POS CD HYPH NN NN IN NNP RB .
According to Professor S D Muni , South Asia expert at the Jawaharal Nehru University , the two - year peace talks between Colombo and the Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam ( LTTE ) are stalemated .	VBG IN NNP NNP NNP NNP , NNP NNP NN IN DT NNP NNP NNP , DT CD HYPH NN NN NNS IN NNP CC DT NNP NNPS IN NNP NNP -LRB- NNP -RRB- VBP VBN .
For that reason , he said , Kumaratunga 's government was keen to beef up military preparedness with Indian support .	IN DT NN , PRP VBD , NNP POS NN VBD JJ TO VB RP JJ NN IN JJ NN .
" The Sri Lankan government does not want to initiate a conflict but would be interested in deterring the LTTE from starting one .	`` DT JJ JJ NN VBZ RB VB TO VB DT NN CC MD VB JJ IN VBG DT NNP IN VBG CD .
And the Tigers look as if they are on the brink of launching another offensive , " Muni told IPS .	CC DT NNPS VBP IN IN PRP VBP IN DT NN IN VBG DT NN , '' NNP VBD NNP .
Colombo held six rounds of talks with the Tigers between September 2002 and March 2003 .	NNP VBD CD NNS IN NNS IN DT NNPS IN NNP CD CC NNP CD .
But last April , the rebels abruptly pulled out of negotiations demanding recognition , first , for the right to self - rule before proceeding any further .	CC JJ NNP , DT NNS RB VBD RP IN NNS VBG NN , RB , IN DT NN IN NN HYPH NN IN VBG RB RB .
Kumaratunga 's India tour preceded a three - day visit to Sri Lanka by Norwegian Foreign Minister Jan Petersen in a new bid to revive the peace talks that were supposed to follow a ceasefire that Oslo successfully brokered in February 2002 . Trouble on India 's islands	NN IN NNP POS NNS
Ramtanu Maitra	NNP NNP
In early February , India charged 34 Arakan separatists from Myanmar with hiding in the Landfall Islands , part of the Andaman Islands group ( see end note ) .	IN JJ NNP , NNP VBD CD JJ NNS IN NNP IN VBG IN DT NNP NNPS , NN IN DT NNP NNPS NN -LRB- VB NN NN -RRB- .
These alleged members of the Arakan Army , the military wing of the National Unity Party in Myanmar , have been charged with illegal entry .	DT JJ NNS IN DT NNP NNP , DT JJ NN IN DT NNP NNP NNP IN NNP , VBP VBN VBN IN JJ NN .
It is likely , but not certain , that they will be deported to Myanmar .	PRP VBZ JJ , CC RB JJ , IN PRP MD VB VBN IN NNP .
But the news of the Arakan rebels is just the tip of the iceberg when it comes to growing concern in New Delhi over the security of the Andaman Islands .	CC DT NN IN DT JJ NNS VBZ RB DT NN IN DT NN WRB PRP VBZ IN VBG NN IN NNP NNP IN DT NN IN DT NNP NNPS .
Reports are circulating in the intelligence community that the Andaman Islands are not only thick with Myanmar rebels .	NNS VBP VBG IN DT NN NN IN DT NNP NNPS VBP RB RB JJ IN NNP NNS .
It has also become an arms depot of the Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam ( LTTE ) , who operate almost freely in the Andaman Sea .	PRP VBZ RB VBN DT NNS NN IN DT NNP NNPS IN NNP NNP -LRB- NNP -RRB- , WP VBP RB RB IN DT NNP NNP .
Information pointing in this direction came to light after the December 26 tsunami , which took a heavy toll on the Andamans .	NN VBG IN DT NN VBD IN NN IN DT NNP CD NN , WDT VBD DT JJ NN IN DT NNPS .
Correspondents who flocked in to cover the tsunami found they also had another story - the miserable security situation surrounding the Indian navy 's Far Eastern Naval Command , now being established along with India 's " blue water navy " . Deteriorating security	VBG NN
Security problems in the Andaman Sea are not new , but they have deteriorated during the past few years , in tandem with a deterioration in the security situation in Bangladesh , Nepal and Bhutan , and particularly in the northeastern Indian states of Manipur , Nagaland and Tripura .	NN NNS IN DT NNP NNP VBP RB JJ , CC PRP VBP VBN IN DT JJ JJ NNS , IN NN IN DT NN IN DT NN NN IN NNP , NNP CC NNP , CC RB IN DT JJ JJ NNS IN NNP , NNP CC NNP .
While the Indian army has become rock - solid in the western front , and has developed the capability of withstanding any Pakistani adventure in that sector , it has become highly vulnerable in its eastern sector , where its enemy is not a national army but a multitude of secessionist , terrorist and drug - running militants operating between Southeast Asia and northeastern India through Bangladesh .	IN DT JJ NN VBZ VBN NN HYPH JJ IN DT JJ NN , CC VBZ VBN DT NN IN VBG DT JJ NN IN DT NN , PRP VBZ VBN RB JJ IN PRP$ JJ NN , WRB PRP$ NN VBZ RB DT JJ NN CC DT NN IN JJ , JJ CC NN HYPH VBG NNS VBG IN NNP NNP CC JJ NNP IN NNP .
The Andaman Sea is a major conduit for this traffic , and the 572 large and small islands that constitute the Andaman and Nicobar group are a natural transit base .	DT NNP NNP VBZ DT JJ NN IN DT NN , CC DT CD JJ CC JJ NNS WDT VBP DT NNP CC NNP NN VBP DT JJ NN NN .
The drugs and arms travel in all directions .	DT NNS CC NNS VBP IN DT NNS .
Since the " Sea Tigers " of the LTTE , better known as the Tamil Tigers , are the ones who rule the Andaman Sea : they carry the arms and drugs for their own use and also to deliver to rebels in Aceh and all along the east coast of Africa . It is old news that the Tamil Tigers have developed a strong network within South Africa .	PRP VBZ JJ NN IN DT NNP NNPS VBP VBN DT JJ NN IN NNP NNP .
This is not unknown to New Delhi .	DT VBZ RB JJ IN NNP NNP .
A recent report by a journalist from Port Blair , in the Andamans , quoted an unnamed official saying that foreigners from Myanmar , Bangladesh and Sri Lanka have permanently settled in the islands , using fake Indian ration cards , while citizens of Thailand , China , Indonesia and Malaysia have migrated temporarily to plunder the natural resources and leave . " Port Blair , Havelock Islands , Diglipur , Middle Nicobar , Campbell 's Bay , Neil Islands and Rangott are mostly overrun by foreigners , " he said .	`` NNP NNP , NNP NNPS , NNP , NNP NNP , NNP POS NNP , NNP NNPS CC NNP VBP RB VBN IN NNS , '' PRP VBD .
An official estimate issued in 2003 suggests there are 50,000 " foreigners " in the Andaman Islands , but unofficial figures are much higher than this .	DT JJ NN VBN IN CD VBZ EX VBP CD `` NNS '' IN DT NNP NNPS , CC JJ NNS VBP RB JJR IN DT .
A large number of them are Bangladeshis , who like millions of their countrymen have left their densely populated homeland to settle elsewhere .	DT JJ NN IN PRP VBP NNPS , WP IN NNS IN PRP$ NNS VBP VBN PRP$ RB VBN NN TO VB RB .
As most of them have few technical skills , and the Andamans have little demand for them in any case , they turn to smuggling and other unlawful activities .	IN JJS IN PRP VBP JJ JJ NNS , CC DT NNPS VBP JJ NN IN PRP IN DT NN , PRP VBP IN NN CC JJ JJ NNS .
The presence of the Sea Tigers in the area with guns , cash and drugs makes the situation extremely dangerous .	DT NN IN DT NNP NNPS IN DT NN IN NNS , NN CC NNS VBZ DT NN RB JJ .
Reports from Port Blair make it evident that New Delhi gets little on - the - ground intelligence , and the Indian Coast Guard is grossly unequipped to deal with the surge of illegal migrants to the islands . One unnamed naval officer was quoted saying , " Arms smuggling is a very profitable business in this region . "	CD JJ JJ NN VBD VBN VBG , '' NNS NN VBZ DT RB JJ NN IN DT NN . ''
Considering the islands ' huge strategic importance , it is amazing how lax New Delhi has been .	VBG DT NNS POS JJ JJ NN , PRP VBZ JJ WRB JJ NNP NNP VBZ VBN .
These islands sit aside the vital sea lanes of the Strait of Malacca , through which 300 tankers and merchant ships pass daily , bringing in oil for the Far East and Southeast Asia .	DT NNS VBP IN DT JJ NN NNS IN DT NNP IN NNP , IN WDT CD NNS CC NN NNS VBP RB , VBG RB NN IN DT NNP NNP CC NNP NNP .
Intelligence lapses	NN NNS
As the implications of the Andaman Islands situation sink in , Indian intelligence has inevitably come under scrutiny .	IN DT NNS IN DT NNP NNPS NN VBP RB , JJ NN VBZ RB VBN IN NN .

India 's Andaman and Nicobar Islands comprise more than 500 islands lying 1,000 kilometers east of Sri Lanka in the Bay of Bengal .	NNP POS NNP CC NNP NNPS VBP JJR IN CD NNS VBG CD NNS RB IN NNP NNP IN DT NNP IN NNP .

" A View from the Eye of the Storm "	`` DT NNP IN DT NNP IN DT NNP ``
Talk delivered by Haim Harari at a meeting of the International Advisory Board of a large multi-national corporation , April , 2004 :	NN VBN IN NNP NNP IN DT NN IN DT NNP NNP NNP IN DT JJ JJ NN , NNP , CD :
" As you know , I usually provide the scientific and technological " entertainment " in our meetings , but , on this occasion , our Chairman suggested that I present my own personal view on events in the part of the world from which I come .	`` IN PRP VBP , PRP RB VBP DT JJ CC JJ `` NN '' IN PRP$ NNS , CC , IN DT NN , PRP$ NNP VBD IN PRP VB PRP$ JJ JJ NN IN NNS IN DT NN IN DT NN IN WDT PRP VBP .
I have never been and I will never be a Government official and I have no privileged information .	PRP VBP RB VBN CC PRP MD RB VB DT NN NN CC PRP VBP DT JJ NN .

I prefer to devote most of my remarks to the broader picture of the region and its place in world events .	PRP VBP TO VB JJS IN PRP$ NNS IN DT JJR NN IN DT NN CC PRP$ NN IN NN NNS .
I refer to the entire area between Pakistan and Morocco , which is predominantly Arab , predominantly Moslem , but includes many non-Arab and also significant non-Moslem minorities .	PRP VBP IN DT JJ NN IN NNP CC NNP , WDT VBZ RB JJ , RB JJ , CC VBZ JJ JJ CC RB JJ JJ NNS .
Why do I put aside Israel and its own immediate neighborhood ?	WRB VBP PRP VB RP NNP CC PRP$ JJ JJ NN .
Because Israel and any problems related to it , in spite of what you might read or hear in the world media , is not the central issue , and has never been the central issue in the upheaval in the region . Transmission Expansion and Systems in Transition Conference Feb. 5 - 8 , 2002 , Miami , Florida	NN NN CC NNP IN NNP NNP NNP CD SYM CD , CD , NNP , NNP
OVERVIEW	NN
This conference will examine the business and regulatory challenges to U.S. electric systems in transition in effectively expanding transmission capacity to meet new demands in the larger and more competitive regional markets emerging under FERC 's RTO initiatives .	DT NN MD VB DT NN CC JJ NNS IN NNP JJ NNS IN NN IN RB VBG NN NN TO VB JJ NNS IN DT JJR CC JJR JJ JJ NNS VBG IN NNP POS NNP NNS .
The conference will review the parameters of these challenges and possible solutions to them .	DT NN MD VB DT NNS IN DT NNS CC JJ NNS IN PRP .
It will examine technology options and new business models for transmission expansion .	PRP MD VB NN NNS CC JJ NN NNS IN NN NN .
It will analyze emerging proposals for effective transmission planning and pricing , including market - based pricing alternatives to FERC 's traditional pricing methods .	PRP MD VB VBG NNS IN JJ NN NN CC NN , VBG NN HYPH VBN NN NNS IN NNP POS JJ NN NNS .
The conference will also discuss what it will take in legislative action and regulatory initiative to achieve an efficient regime for ensuring that the nation has a reliable grid and regional trading system . There are still four important issues , however :	EX VBP RB CD JJ NNS , RB :
IT still can not commit to transferring messages across domains .	NN RB MD RB VB IN VBG NNS IN NNS .
This means that messages initiated at Corp and intended for the entire Enron organization will not reach any business units outside the Corp domain .	DT VBZ IN NNS VBN IN NNP CC VBN IN DT JJ NNP NN MD RB VB DT NN NNS IN DT NNP NN .
No messages will reach the EES organization unless IBM agrees not to use their proprietary message delivery tool , WebSphere , and will use WebLogic instead .	DT NNS MD VB DT NNP NN IN NNP VBZ RB TO VB PRP$ JJ NN NN NN , NNP , CC MD VB NNP RB .

HR , intended to be a key user of this tool , will not use BackWeb because survey responses can not be made anonymous .	NN , VBN TO VB DT JJ NN IN DT NN , MD RB VB NNP IN NN NNS MD RB VB VBN JJ .
HR has already purchased a tool called CONFIRMIT that can execute anonymous surveys .	NN VBZ RB VBN DT NN VBN NNP WDT MD VB JJ NNS .
Messages will not be delivered simultaneously to all users in the same domain , nor will they be delivered for two to five hours after they are sent by the message administrator .	NNS MD RB VB VBN RB IN DT NNS IN DT JJ NN , CC MD PRP VB VBN IN CD IN CD NNS IN PRP VBP VBN IN DT NN NN .
Another thing to consider is that these messages will be set to expire and disappear within a set period of time , meaning users can not retrieve them and read them later ( as they can with e-mail ) .	DT NN TO VB VBZ IN DT NNS MD VB JJ TO VB CC VB IN DT VBN NN IN NN , VBG NNS MD RB VB PRP CC VB PRP RB -LRB- IN PRP MD IN NN -RRB- .

Dear Justin	JJ NNP
Marly asked me to respond to you .	NNP VBD PRP TO VB IN PRP .
As you know , the suffix ONLINE is purely descriptive and now used by many companies .	IN PRP VBP , DT NN NN VBZ RB JJ CC RB VBN IN JJ NNS .
Therefore , any trade mark registration that incorporates the word ONLINE as a suffix in the way that you use it will not enable its owner to prevent others from using the word ONLINE .	RB , DT NN NN NN WDT VBZ DT NN NN IN DT NN IN DT NN WRB PRP VBP PRP MD RB VB PRP$ NN TO VB NNS IN VBG DT NN NN .
Given the above , if you have adequate protection for the word ENRON ( which covers the services that you offer on - line as well as your core activities ) , I 'd say that another application for the words ENRON ONLINE is probably unnecessary .	VBN DT JJ , IN PRP VBP JJ NN IN DT NN NNP -LRB- WDT VBZ DT NNS WDT PRP VBP IN HYPH NN RB RB IN PRP$ JJ NNS -RRB- , PRP MD VB IN DT NN IN DT NNS NNP NNP VBZ RB JJ .
However , if you use a particular logo for the on - line service , that should be registered .	RB , IN PRP VBP DT JJ NN IN DT IN HYPH NN NN , DT MD VB VBN .
I hope the above is clear .	PRP VBP DT JJ VBZ JJ .
Jonathan Day	NNP NNP

If you could respond to me on this request , thanks	IN PRP MD VB IN PRP IN DT NN , NN

Bill	NNP
Bill -	NNP ,
If Sam 's description below of the GCP procedure is correct , it looks to me like something needs to be changed .	IN NNP POS NN RB IN DT NN NN VBZ JJ , PRP VBZ IN PRP IN NN VBZ TO VB VBN .
The difficulty lies in the fact that the confirmation system reads the counterparty 's name from Global Counterparty .	DT NN VBZ IN DT NN IN DT NN NN VBZ DT NN POS NN IN JJ NN .
Since divisions of companies are not legal entities they do not have the power to contract in their own names .	IN NNS IN NNS VBP RB JJ NNS PRP VBP RB VB DT NN TO VB IN PRP$ JJ NNS .
If the correct legal name is not in Global Counterparty , the confirmation goes out with the wrong legal name on it seriously compromising the contract itself .	IN DT JJ JJ NN VBZ RB IN JJ NN , DT NN VBZ RB IN DT JJ JJ NN IN PRP RB VBG DT NN PRP .
That is the source of Tana 's concern regarding the correct entering of divisions in the system .	DT VBZ DT NN IN NNP POS NN VBG DT JJ NN IN NNS IN DT NN .
My suggestion is that Global Counterparty use the same name that the customer has signed on the EnronOnline Password Application -- my understanding is that the EnronOnline team returns inappropriate Applications to the customer until they are correctly completed .	PRP$ NN VBZ IN JJ NN VB DT JJ NN WDT DT NN VBZ VBN IN DT NNP NN NN , PRP$ NN VBZ IN DT NNP NN VBZ JJ NNS IN DT NN IN PRP VBP RB VBN .
In this particular case since the counterparty is still not allowed to transact on EnronOnline almost a month after sending in their application they are understandably upset and are now complaining .	IN DT JJ NN IN DT NN VBZ RB RB VBN TO VB IN NNP RB DT NN IN VBG RB PRP$ NN PRP VBP RB JJ CC VBP RB VBG .
I would appreciate it if you could get this one fixed today and , if you have any problem with changing the GCP procedure , please let me know .	PRP MD VB PRP IN PRP MD VB DT NN VBN NN CC , IN PRP VBP DT NN IN VBG DT NN NN , UH VB PRP VB .

08/07/2001 12:36 PM	CD CD NN
To Whom It May Concern :	IN WP PRP MD VB :
Through TV and newspapers , I hear constantly about identity fraud using stolen social security information .	IN NN CC NNS , PRP VBP RB IN NN NN VBG VBN JJ NN NN .
I am very concerned about this issue .	PRP VBP RB JJ IN DT NN .
I have the following suggestion for our company .	PRP VBP DT VBG NN IN PRP$ NN .
Since Enron 's employees are assigned an SAP identification numbers ( P number ) and an HR number , could Enron as a company use these IDs instead of the SS numbers ?	IN NNP POS NNS VBP VBN DT NN NN NNS -LRB- NN NN -RRB- CC DT NN NN , MD NNP IN DT NN VB DT NNS RB IN DT NN NNS .
This will be safer for all employees .	DT MD VB JJR IN DT NNS .

12/21/2000 07:50 PM	CD CD NN
Confidential Settlement Document Per CPUC Rule 51	JJ NN NN IN NNP NN CD
Gas Accord II Settlement Participants :	NN NN CD NN NNS :
Attached is PG&E 's Gas Accord II ( GA II ) Settlement Proposal .	VBN VBZ NNP POS NN NN CD -LRB- NN CD -RRB- NN NN .
We believe it addresses many of the issues and concerns you have raised in the workshops .	PRP VBP PRP VBZ JJ IN DT NNS CC NNS PRP VBP VBN IN DT NNS .
As an overview , this proposal : * Maintains the basic Gas Accord structure in place today for the period 2003 to 2007 . *	IN DT NN , DT NN : NFP VBZ DT JJ NN NN NN IN NN NN IN DT NN CD IN CD . NFP
* Offers end user transportation rates for 2003 lower for most customers than rates in effect today . *	NFP VBZ NN NN NN NNS IN CD JJR IN JJS NNS IN NNS IN NN NN . NFP
* Provides for vintaged Redwood path rates for core customers . *	NFP VBZ IN VBN NN NN NNS IN NN NNS . NFP
* Offers a 7.5 cent / dth rate to large customers while minimizing rate changes to other customers , minimizing the incentive for these customers to seek to bypass local transmission charges and other CPUC - approved charges . *	NFP VBZ DT CD NN SYM JJ NN IN JJ NNS IN VBG NN NNS IN JJ NNS , VBG DT NN IN DT NNS TO VB TO VB JJ NN NNS CC JJ NNP HYPH VBN NNS . NFP
* Adopts guidelines to improve reliability and help moderate prices in gas commodity markets , and identifies the capital projects needed to meet these guidelines over the course of the GA II period ( 2003 - 2007 ) . *	NFP VBZ NNS TO VB NN CC VB VB NNS IN NN NN NNS , CC VBZ DT NN NNS VBN TO VB DT NNS IN DT NN IN DT NN CD NN -LRB- CD SYM CD -RRB- . NFP
* Provides a high degree of rate stability , with a 3.5 % escalator to capture both inflation and the cost of needed capital projects .	NFP VBZ DT JJ NN IN NN NN , IN DT CD NN NN TO VB CC NN CC DT NN IN VBN NN NNS .
The guaranteed rates will be adjustable only for significant changes in the cost of capital or increased costs due to governmental requirements or catastrophic events . *	DT VBN NNS MD VB JJ RB IN JJ NNS IN DT NN IN NN CC VBN NNS IN IN JJ NNS CC JJ NNS . NFP
* Preserves a rate differential between the Redwood and Baja paths , although somewhat less than the current differential . *	NFP VBZ DT NN NN IN DT NN CC NN NNS , IN RB JJR IN DT JJ NN . NFP
* Proposes a two - stage open season for firm transportation services beginning in 2003 , with end users receiving a first option on available capacity . *	NFP VBZ DT CD HYPH NN JJ NN IN NN NN NNS VBG IN CD , IN NN NNS VBG DT JJ NN IN JJ NN . NFP
* Maintains the core aggregation program with some adjustments .	NFP VBZ DT NN NN NN IN DT NNS .
PG&E also anticipates that the Core Procurement Incentive Mechanism ( CPIM ) will be similar to today 's mechanism , but will reflect the somewhat larger capacity holdings needed to meet anticipated increases in core demand and to meet a 1 - day in 10 - year cold weather event . This also will serve as a reminder that an all - Party meeting is scheduled at PG&E 's headquarters in San Francisco on January 10 and 11 , to discuss this proposal and to respond to your questions .	DT RB MD VB IN DT NN IN DT DT HYPH NN NN VBZ VBN IN NNP POS NNS IN NNP NNP IN NNP CD CC CD , TO VB DT NN CC TO VB IN PRP$ NNS .

Jeff -	NNP ,
instead of suggesting a specific rate increase - 10 or 15 % , I think we should acknowledge that a " modest " increase may be necessary and may in fact be desirable - but that the specific amount of increase should be reasoned and subject to well thought out evidence and hearings , not just determined by whim .	RB IN VBG DT JJ NN NN , CD CC CD NN , PRP VBP PRP MD VB IN DT `` JJ '' NN MD VB JJ CC MD IN NN VB JJ , CC IN DT JJ NN IN NN MD VB JJ CC JJ IN RB VBN RP NN CC NNS , CC RB VBN IN NN .
In general , we should not be overly prescriptive at this point and I know you agree with that .	IN JJ , PRP MD RB VB RB JJ IN DT NN CC PRP VBP PRP VBP IN DT .
Otherwise , I think you have captured the points excellently .	RB , PRP VBP PRP VBP VBN DT NNS RB .
We 're in the process of developing a strategy to take us through the next few months .	PRP VBP IN DT NN IN VBG DT NN TO VB PRP IN DT JJ JJ NNS .
But while the ( otherwise perishable ) thoughts are still fresh in my mind from the hearings on Monday and Tuesday , I wanted to throw out some observations for discussion in the days / weeks ahead .	CC IN DT -LRB- RB JJ -RRB- NNS VBP RB JJ IN PRP$ NN IN DT NNS IN NNP CC NNP , PRP VBD TO VB RB DT NNS IN NN IN DT NNS , NNS RB .
OBSERVATION -- The pressure to finger somebody for " price gouging " is increasing .	NN : DT NN TO VB NN IN `` NN NN '' VBZ VBG .
The administration is hell bent on finding a " fall guy . "	DT NN VBZ NN JJ IN VBG DT `` NN NN . ''
The price spikes pose real political risks for Davis and he and his folks need and want an easy way out .	DT NN NNS VBP JJ JJ NNS IN NNP CC PRP CC PRP$ NNS VBP CC VBP DT JJ NN RB .
His press release following the hearing renewed the call for " refunds . "	PRP$ NN NN VBG DT NN VBD DT NN IN `` NNS . ''
On my panel , Loretta Lynch asked Reliant and Duke to supply her with the details of the contracts they cut to sell their power forward to marketers .	IN PRP$ NN , NNP NNP VBD NNP CC NNP TO VB PRP IN DT NNS IN DT NNS PRP VBD TO VB PRP$ NN RB IN NNS .
And Carl Wood 's remarks were extreme .	CC NNP NNP POS NNS VBD JJ .
At the Barton hearing , a liberal democrat ( Filner ) and a conservative Republican ( Hunter ) locked arms in calling for refunds .	IN DT NNP NN , DT JJ NNP -LRB- NNP -RRB- CC DT JJ NNP -LRB- NNP -RRB- VBD NNS IN VBG IN NNS .
Bilbray joined the " gouging " band wagon .	NNP VBD DT `` NN '' NN NN .
The utilities repeatedly called on FERC to do a " real " investigation , with hearings , testimony , data discovery --- the works .	DT NNS RB VBD IN NNP TO VB DT `` JJ '' NN , IN NNS , NN , NN NN , DT NNS .
On the positive side , the FERC commissioners lauded Wolak , his analysis , and his remarks on the panel .	IN DT JJ NN , DT NNP NNS VBD NNP , PRP$ NN , CC PRP$ NNS IN DT NN .
Wolak said somewhat emphatically that the nature of California 's market structure makes it impossible to single out a single participant as the culprit .	NNP VBD RB RB IN DT NN IN NNP POS NN NN VBZ PRP JJ TO VB RP DT JJ NN IN DT NN .
He also stated that just everyone 's just acting in their own self - interest , responding to the screwed incentives embedded in the structure .	PRP RB VBD IN RB NN VBZ RB VBG IN PRP$ JJ NN HYPH NN , VBG IN DT VBN NNS VBN IN DT NN .
IMPLICATION -- It seems prudent for Enron to understand better its risks of getting fingered .	NN : PRP VBZ JJ IN NNP TO VB RBR PRP$ NNS IN VBG VBN .
In the best case , the clamoring for a " refund " subsides .	IN DT JJS NN , DT NN IN DT `` NN '' VBZ .
In which case , the only cost to Enron is the internal cost incurred to understand better the risks of getting fingered .	IN WDT NN , DT JJ NN IN NNP VBZ DT JJ NN VBN TO VB RBR DT NNS IN VBG VBN .

following up on our discussion yesterday ; for these types of deals , i do nt think it s necessary to have all the documentation of our counterparty 's authorization to enter into the agreement .	VBG RP IN PRP$ NN NN , IN DT NNS IN NNS , PRP VBP RB VB PRP VBZ JJ TO VB PDT DT NN IN PRP$ NN POS NN TO VB IN DT NN .
these are short term transactions and requiring this documentation will cause us to lose business because competitive alternatives do not have such burdensome requirements .	DT VBP JJ NN NNS CC VBG DT NN MD VB PRP TO VB NN IN JJ NNS VBP RB VB JJ JJ NNS .
the primary reason we need these things is for the scenario where a muni does a derivative deal with an open - ended downside , loses $ 50 million , and then claims that it was not a valid contract .	DT JJ NN PRP VBP DT NNS VBZ IN DT NN WRB DT NN VBZ DT NN NN IN DT JJ HYPH JJ NN , VBZ $ CD CD , CC RB VBZ IN PRP VBD RB DT JJ NN .
in our case , they are only hedging .	IN PRP$ NN , PRP VBP RB VBG .
we are collecting a premium up front and their total cost is known up front .	PRP VBP VBG DT NN IN NN CC PRP$ JJ NN VBZ VBN IN NN .
therefore they will not attempt to make this claim .	RB PRP MD RB VB TO VB DT NN .
even if they did , our risk is limited to the premium , not some big payout .	RB IN PRP VBD , PRP$ NN VBZ VBN IN DT NN , RB DT JJ NN .
the risk of losing business is far greater than the risk of a counterparty trying to get their premium back .	DT NN IN VBG NN VBZ RB JJR IN DT NN IN DT NN VBG TO VB PRP$ NN RP .
seems like a 5 second decision to me .	VBZ IN DT CD NN NN IN PRP .
is it possible to combine the standard isda and our confirm into a single long form ?	VBZ PRP JJ TO VB DT JJ NN CC PRP$ NN IN DT JJ JJ NN .
by going away from the standard isda maybe we can eliminate these requirements because the payout liability is only 1 - way .	IN VBG RB IN DT JJ NN RB PRP MD VB DT NNS IN DT NN NN VBZ RB CD HYPH NN .

What happened ?	WP VBD .
Here 's a story ... as I was waiting at the bus stop ( 7:35 am ) to go to school , a lady approached me and asked if I 'd make sure her daughter got on a certain bus .	RB VBZ DT NN , IN PRP VBD VBG IN DT NN NN -LRB- CD NN -RRB- TO VB IN NN , DT NN VBD PRP CC VBD IN PRP MD VB JJ PRP$ NN VBD IN DT JJ NN .

It was now , 8:15 and there was no sign of her bus .	PRP VBD RB , CD CC EX VBD DT NN IN PRP$ NN .
On top of things , I had quiz at 8 am .	IN NN IN NNS , PRP VBD NN IN CD NN .
Which I then realized I missed .	WDT PRP RB VBD PRP VBD .

I asked her if she had any relatives that would want to know of her whereabouts .	PRP VBD PRP IN PRP VBD DT NNS WDT MD VB TO VB IN PRP$ NNS .
I called her grandmother and explained things to her .	PRP VBD PRP$ NN CC VBD NNS IN PRP .
Pretty strange ... aye .	RB JJ , UH .
A bus that runs through UofH arrived and I almost got on without her , but I could n't do it .	DT NN WDT VBZ IN NNP VBD CC PRP RB VBD RB IN PRP , CC PRP MD RB VB PRP .
Finally , I told the little girl that she would have to accompany me to school ( 8:30 am ) .	RB , PRP VBD DT JJ NN IN PRP MD VB TO VB PRP IN NN -LRB- CD NN -RRB- .
There were only 15 minutes left of class .	EX VBD RB CD NNS JJ IN NN .
I stayed for the remainder of the lecture .	PRP VBD IN DT NN IN DT NN .

I told the bus driver where to drop her off .	PRP VBD DT NN NN WRB TO VB PRP$ RP .

7 . Delete the definition of Costs as it is already defined in Section 6.2.1 .	LS . VB DT NN IN NNS IN PRP VBZ RB VBN IN NN CD .
8 . Where is the defined term Govt Authority used ?	LS . WRB VBZ DT VBN NN NN NN VBN .
9 . In the GTC , the ECP rep should also apply to EESI .	LS . IN DT NN , DT NN NN MD RB VB IN NN .
Also , in the 7th line of the reps add the word " into " after the word " entered " and before the word " this " .	RB , IN DT JJ NN IN DT NNS VB DT NN `` NN '' IN DT NN `` NN '' CC IN DT NN `` NN '' .
10 . In Collateral Requests , insert a comma after deposit in the last line .	LS . IN NN NNS , VB DT NN IN NN IN DT JJ NN .
I will also add granting / perfection language .	PRP MD RB VB NN , NN NN .
11 . In Events of Default , clause ( a ) refers to a dispute section which I 'm not sure exists .	LS . IN NNS IN NN , NN -LRB- NN -RRB- VBZ IN DT NN NN WDT PRP VBP RB JJ VBZ .
In clause ( e ) , delete the " s " : from the word consolidation .	IN NN -LRB- NN -RRB- , VB DT `` NN '' : IN DT NN NN .

Carol :	NNP :
I have attempted to incorporate the changes that Jim has incorporated in our long form power agreement which ENA has suggested to date into the short form .	PRP VBP VBN TO VB DT NNS WDT NNP VBZ VBN IN PRP$ JJ NN NN NN WDT NNP VBZ VBN IN NN IN DT JJ NN .
Attached please find a sample short form ( for the Con Ed market ) for your review .	VBN UH VB DT NN JJ NN -LRB- IN DT NN NN NN -RRB- IN PRP$ NN .
Please note the following as you review :	UH VB DT VBG IN PRP VBP :
1 . The short forms do not contain the optionality relating to our performing billing services -- all of our midmarket forms anticipate that we will act as customer 's billing agent and that we will collect all amounts due related to T&D and the like from the customer ( and reflect same on our invoice ) and pass those amounts on to the customer 's utility .	LS . DT JJ NNS VBP RB VB DT NN VBG IN PRP$ VBG NN NNS , DT IN PRP$ JJ NNS VBP IN PRP MD VB IN NN POS NN NN CC IN PRP MD VB DT NNS JJ JJ IN NN CC DT JJ IN DT NN -LRB- CC VB JJ IN PRP$ NN -RRB- CC VB DT NNS RB IN DT NN POS NN .
2 . I did not include a " Setoff " provision in this draft , mainly because the vast majority of the time , we will not , nor will an affiliate , have another agreement in place with these customers .	LS . PRP VBD RB VB DT `` NN '' NN IN DT NN , RB IN DT JJ NN IN DT NN , PRP MD RB , CC MD DT NN , VB DT NN IN NN IN DT NNS .
If you feel strongly about our including a setoff provision , we will do so .	IN PRP VBP RB IN PRP$ VBG DT NN NN , PRP MD VB RB .
3 . The change in law provision reads a bit differently from the long form -- the thinking here is that the long form language is very lengthy and rather harsh ( and we 've had great difficulty selling it in the past ) .	LS . DT NN IN NN NN VBZ DT NN RB IN DT JJ NN , DT NN RB VBZ IN DT JJ NN NN VBZ RB JJ CC RB JJ -LRB- CC PRP VBP VBN JJ NN VBG PRP IN DT NN -RRB- .
Taking into consideration this class of customer , we decided to include certain items , including our inability to cover our costs due to a change in law , rules or practices as a " force majeure event " in an effort to soften the approach ( see the GTCs ) .	VBG IN NN DT NN IN NN , PRP VBD TO VB JJ NNS , VBG PRP$ NN TO VB PRP$ NNS IN IN DT NN IN NN , NNS CC NNS IN DT `` NN NN NN '' IN DT NN TO VB DT NN -LRB- VB DT NNS -RRB- .
Also we do not address calculation of a termination payment in the event of a change in law as the long form does -- again , more in the interest of " saving space " than anything else ...	RB PRP VBP RB VB NN IN DT NN NN IN DT NN IN DT NN IN NN IN DT JJ NN VBZ , RB , RBR IN DT NN IN `` VBG NN '' IN NN JJ .
Let us know your thoughts on this document and if you are comfortable with our using this until such time as the hybrid form is launched .	VB PRP VB PRP$ NNS IN DT NN CC IN PRP VBP JJ IN PRP$ VBG DT IN JJ NN IN DT NN NN VBZ VBN .
If you are comfortable , we will drive these changes into our other midmarket power forms .	IN PRP VBP JJ , PRP MD VB DT NNS IN PRP$ JJ JJ NN NNS .
Thanks again for your help with this project ,	NN RB IN PRP$ NN IN DT NN ,

Probing the ' palace coup '	VBG DT `` NN NN ''
Electricity : A panel focuses on price hikes and the actions of the ISO president .	NN : DT NN VBZ IN NN NNS CC DT NNS IN DT NNP NNP .
September 26 , 2001	NNP CD , CD
By KIMBERLY KINDY	IN NNP NNP
The Orange County Register	DT NNP NNP NNP
SACRAMENTO	NNP
A state Senate committee is set today to start serving 16 subpoenas on electricity producers and officials who manage California 's energy grid to determine whether they acted in concert to manipulate energy prices .	DT NN NNP NN VBZ VBN NN TO VB VBG CD NNS IN NN NNS CC NNS WP VBP NNP POS NN NN TO VB IN PRP VBD IN NN TO VB NN NNS .
The investigative committee , headed by state Sen. Joe Dunn , D - Santa Ana , is focusing on a series of events last fall filled with enough Shakespearean plot twists and intrigue that it has earned a name around the Capitol : " the palace coup . "	DT JJ NN , VBN IN NN NNP NNP NNP , NNP , NNP NNP , VBZ VBG IN DT NN IN NNS JJ NN VBN IN JJ JJ NN NNS CC NN IN PRP VBZ VBN DT NN IN DT NNP : `` DT NN NN . ''
Lawmakers and consumer groups allege that the events - directed by the man who heads the state 's energy grid - fueled the California energy crisis , pushed the state into the power - buying business and helped make billions of dollars for power producers .	NNS CC NN NNS VBP IN DT NNS , VBN IN DT NN WP VBZ DT NN POS NN NN , VBD DT NNP NN NN , VBD DT NN IN DT NN HYPH VBG NN CC VBD VB NNS IN NNS IN NN NNS .
The central question behind the palace coup is whether Terry Winter , the president of the Independent System Operator , acted alone when he took steps to remove key price caps designed to limit the amount power generators could charge .	DT JJ NN IN DT NN NN VBZ IN NNP NNP , DT NN IN DT NNP NNP NNP , VBD RB WRB PRP VBD NNS TO VB JJ NN NNS VBN TO VB DT NN NN NNS MD VB .
Winter defied his own board and Gov. Gray Davis when he filed a 50 - page request to remove the caps , records and interviews show .	NNP VBD PRP$ JJ NN CC NNP NNP NNP WRB PRP VBD DT CD HYPH NN NN TO VB DT NNS , NNS CC NNS VBP .
" I do n't know how these events could have taken place without some concerted effort , " said Dunn .	`` PRP VBP RB VB WRB DT NNS MD VB VBN NN IN DT JJ NN , '' VBD NNP .
The subpoenas will force those involved , including Winter , to provide sworn testimony about the events to the committee , and to turn over e-mails , personal calendars and memos .	DT NNS MD VB DT VBN , VBG NNP , TO VB VBN NN IN DT NNS IN DT NN , CC TO VB RP NNS , JJ NNS CC NNS .
Davis spokesman Steve Maviglio said the governor felt " betrayed " by the actions of Winter .	NNP NN NNP NNP VBD DT NN VBD `` JJ '' IN DT NNS IN NNP .
" The governor believes it was the defining moment , when what was a mounting problem turned into an instant crisis , " Maviglio said .	`` DT NN VBZ PRP VBD DT VBG NN , WRB WP VBD DT VBG NN VBD IN DT JJ NN , '' NNP VBD .
Winter refused comment , referring all questions to the public relations office .	NNP VBD NN , VBG DT NNS IN DT JJ NNS NN .
ISO spokesman Gregg Fishman said Dunn 's committee will find no criminal conduct .	NNP NN NNP NNP VBD NNP POS NN MD VB DT JJ NN .
The decision was made by ISO upper management with one goal in mind : to keep the lights on .	DT NN VBD VBN IN NNP JJ NN IN CD NN IN NN : TO VB DT NNS RP .
At the time , generators were refusing to sell power in California because of the price caps .	IN DT NN , NNS VBD VBG TO VB NN IN NNP IN IN DT NN NNS .
" It was an emergency , " Fishman said .	`` PRP VBD DT NN , '' NNP VBD .
" We had to take action . ''	`` PRP VBD TO VB NN . ''
What became known as the palace coup began on Oct. 26 when ISO board members voted for severe restrictions on the amount of money electricity producers could charge for power .	WP VBD JJ IN DT NN NN VBD IN NNP CD WRB NNP NN NNS VBD IN JJ NNS IN DT NN IN NN NN NNS MD VB IN NN .
The restrictions would drive prices as low as $ 65 per megawatt - nearly 12 times below the $ 750 per megawatt limits of seven months earlier .	DT NNS MD VB NNS RB JJ IN $ CD IN NN , RB CD NNS IN DT $ CD IN NN NNS IN CD NNS RBR .
" They ( electricity generators ) grinned and beared the $ 750 price cap , but this new plan by ISO was too much , " said Dunn , whose committee has been investigating since March .	`` PRP -LRB- NN NNS -RRB- VBD CC VBD DT $ CD NN NN , CC DT JJ NN IN NNP VBD RB JJ , '' VBD NNP , WP$ NN VBZ VBN VBG IN NNP .
" All hell broke loose . ''	`` DT NN VBD RB . ''
Records show that on Oct. 31 , power generators and electricity traders filed letters with the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission , demanding that the new plan be killed .	NNS VBP IN IN NNP CD , NN NNS CC NN NNS VBD NNS IN DT NNP NNP NNP NNP , VBG IN DT JJ NN VB VBN .
The letters , six in all , were sent within two hours of each other and represented dozens of power generators .	DT NNS , CD IN DT , VBD VBN IN CD NNS IN DT JJ CC VBD NNS IN NN NNS .
" If not removed immediately , the ( ISO ) price cap will sow confusion in the market , threaten reliability and stifle new investment in generating capacity , '' read one letter written by Duke Energy Vice President William Hall III .	`` IN RB VBN RB , DT -LRB- NNP -RRB- NN NN MD VB NN IN DT NN , VB NN CC VB JJ NN IN NN NN , '' VBD CD NN VBN IN NNP NNP NN NN NNP NNP CD .
Although there is nothing illegal about the generators acting together to lobby against price caps , Dunn believes the letters and other actions around the same time showed clear coordination among energy officials .	IN EX VBZ NN JJ IN DT NNS VBG RB TO VB IN NN NNS , NNP VBZ DT NNS CC JJ NNS IN DT JJ NN VBD JJ NN IN NN NNS .
He said the main aim of the subpoenas will be to determine whether collusion occurred to " fix " prices , which would violate federal trade laws .	PRP VBD DT JJ NN IN DT NNS MD VB TO VB IN NN VBD TO `` VB '' NNS , WDT MD VB JJ NN NNS .
In the Oct. 31 letters , electricity producers told federal officials that if price caps were n't removed it would lead to a collapse of the energy market .	IN DT NNP CD NNS , NN NNS VBD JJ NNS IN IN NN NNS VBD RB VBN PRP MD VB IN DT NN IN DT NN NN .
The generators got their way .	DT NNS VBD PRP$ NN .
The next day , the federal commission killed the new pricing plan .	DT JJ NN , DT JJ NN VBD DT JJ NN NN .
What was left in place was a $ 250 price cap established five months earlier .	WP VBD VBN IN NN VBD DT $ CD NN NN VBN CD NNS RBR .
Power producers then turned their attention toward killing that cap , saying they could n't make a profit even under these constraints .	NN NNS RB VBD PRP$ NN IN VBG DT NN , VBG PRP MD RB VB DT NN RB IN DT NNS .
They began to withhold power from California , and on Dec. 7 the ISO declared its first Stage 3 emergency and braced for blackouts , which were narrowly averted .	PRP VBD TO VB NN IN NNP , CC IN NNP CD DT NNP VBD PRP$ JJ NN CD NN CC VBD IN NNS , WDT VBD RB VBN .
What followed the next day is considered by the governor and Dunn to be the pivotal moment of the energy crisis .	WP VBD DT JJ NN VBZ VBN IN DT NN CC NNP TO VB DT JJ NN IN DT NN NN .
Winter , who in his position as president and chief operating officer of the ISO , submitted a 50 - page emergency request , asking federal officials to abolish the $ 250 price cap .	NNP , WP IN PRP$ NN IN NN CC JJ VBG NN IN DT NNP , VBD DT CD HYPH NN NN NN , VBG JJ NNS TO VB DT $ CD NN NN .
Final authority over lifting the cap rested with the federal government .	JJ NN IN VBG DT NN VBD IN DT JJ NN .
Neither the ISO board , which had established the price cap , nor the governor learned of Winter 's actions until the cap had been removed .	CC DT NNP NN , WDT VBD VBN DT NN NN , CC DT NN VBD IN NNP POS NNS IN DT NN VBD VBN VBN .
In fact , the attorney who helped draft the emergency request , Charles Robinson , was in a meeting with representatives of the governor and ISO board members just hours before the filing was made .	IN NN , DT NN WP VBD VB DT NN NN , NNP NNP , VBD IN DT NN IN NNS IN DT NN CC NNP NN NNS RB NNS IN DT NN VBD VBN .
He did n't mention anything about it .	PRP VBD RB VB NN IN PRP .
" In retrospect , we should have told them , '' Robinson said .	`` IN NN , PRP MD VB VBN PRP , '' NNP VBD .
With the price caps gone , the generators filed paperwork with federal regulators justifying higher costs .	IN DT NN NNS JJ , DT NNS VBD NN IN JJ NNS VBG JJR NNS .
" The ISO staff sat in a meeting with the governor 's key energy advisers with poker faces , not saying a word about something that was going on at the exact same moment , '' Maviglio said .	`` DT NNP NN VBD IN DT NN IN DT NN POS JJ NN NNS IN NN NNS , RB VBG DT NN IN NN WDT VBD VBG RP IN DT RB JJ NN , '' NNP VBD .
" It was beyond belief that they failed to mention something so significant .	`` PRP VBD IN NN IN PRP VBD TO VB NN RB JJ .
This action accelerated the utilities ' move toward bankruptcy and forced the governor to move the state into the power - buying business . "	DT NN VBD DT NNS POS NN IN NN CC VBD DT NN TO VB DT NN IN DT NN HYPH VBG NN . ''
Prices for electricity jumped from an average of $ 249 a megawatt to $ 700 a megawatt within three days , ISO records show .	NNS IN NN VBD IN DT NN IN $ CD DT NN IN $ CD DT NN IN CD NNS , NNP NNS VBP .
Dunn believes the resulting overcharges for electricity exceeded $ 30 billion .	NNP VBZ DT VBG NNS IN NN VBD $ CD CD .
Robinson said the filing - granted two hours after the request - helped rather than hurt Californians .	NNP VBD DT NN , VBN CD NNS IN DT NN , VBD IN IN VBD NNPS .
Prices , he said , did not spike as a result .	NNS , PRP VBD , VBD RB VB IN DT NN .
Instead they followed the skyrocketing price of natural gas - which is used to run power plants to generate electricity .	RB PRP VBD DT VBG NN IN JJ NN , WDT VBZ VBN TO VB NN NNS TO VB NN .
Robinson said the emergency order allowed the ISO to secure refunds should overcharges for electricity be proven to federal officials .	NNP VBD DT NN NN VBD DT NNP TO VB NNS MD NNS IN NN VB VBN IN JJ NNS .
" We believe the action we took addressed a severe concern , '' Robinson said .	`` PRP VBP DT NN PRP VBD VBD DT JJ NN , '' NNP VBD .
" In our view , we did not believe we changed or made worse the financial situation .	`` IN PRP$ NN , PRP VBD RB VB PRP VBD CC VBD JJR DT JJ NN .
We felt we made it better because it introduced a process for review and refund . "	PRP VBD PRP VBD PRP JJR IN PRP VBD DT NN IN NN CC NN . ''
Jan Smutney - Jones , who was the ISO board chairman at the time and executive director of a group that represents power generators , said Winter did not consult him about eliminating the price cap .	NNP NNP HYPH NNP , WP VBD DT NNP NN NN IN DT NN CC JJ NN IN DT NN WDT VBZ NN NNS , VBD NNP VBD RB VB PRP IN VBG DT NN NN .
Smutney - Jones also said he was unaware of anyone in the power - generating community being consulted .	NNP HYPH NNP RB VBD PRP VBD JJ IN NN IN DT NN HYPH NN NN VBG VBN .
" Terry did this by himself , '' said Smutney - Jones , executive director of the Independent Energy Producers .	`` NNP VBD DT IN PRP , '' VBD NNP HYPH NNP , JJ NN IN DT NNP NNP NNPS .
" He did what he thought had to be done at the time to keep the power flowing . "	`` PRP VBD WP PRP VBD VBD TO VB VBN IN DT NN TO VB DT NN VBG . ''
The ISO board called an emergency meeting the next week demanding Winter explain his actions .	DT NNP NN VBD DT NN NN DT JJ NN VBG NNP VB PRP$ NNS .
Some board members pushed to have Winter removed , but there were concerns such action would lead to more chaos , the governor 's spokesman Maviglio said .	DT NN NNS VBD TO VB NNP VBN , CC EX VBD NNS JJ NN MD VB IN JJR NN , DT NN POS NN NNP VBD .
James J. Hoecker , the former Federal Energy Regulatory Commission chairman , defended making the December decision and also defended Winter .	NNP NNP NNP , DT JJ NNP NNP NNP NNP NN , VBD VBG DT NNP NN CC RB VBD NNP .
" They filed an emergency motion , and we were not about to let California go dark , '' Hoecker said .	`` PRP VBD DT NN NN , CC PRP VBD RB RB TO VB NNP VB JJ , '' NNP VBD .
" They ( ISO management ) did what any independent system operator would do . "	`` PRP -LRB- NNP NN -RRB- VBD WP DT JJ NN NN MD VB . ''
What Dunn 's committee hopes to learn is why all these events transpired .	WP NNP POS NN VBZ TO VB VBZ WRB PDT DT NNS VBD .
He believes memos and e-mails around the time of Winter 's Dec. 8 actions should provide vital clues .	PRP VBZ NNS CC NNS IN DT NN IN NNP POS NNP CD NNS MD VB JJ NNS .
" We do n't know why he did what he did , but we are eager to find out , " Dunn said .	`` PRP VBP RB VB WRB PRP VBD WP PRP VBD , CC PRP VBP JJ TO VB RP , '' NNP VBD .
" Terry said he made that filing in the interest of Californians , but I find that argument has no basis in fact . ''	`` NNP VBD PRP VBD DT NN IN DT NN IN NNPS , CC PRP VBP DT NN VBZ DT NN IN NN . ''

Healing the Collective Body	VBG DT JJ NN
In George Orwell 's influential novel " 1984 " doublethink is a device promoted by the totalitarian state government to make people accept two irreconcilable ideas at the same time such as " war is peace " .	IN NNP NNP POS JJ NN `` NNP '' NN VBZ DT NN VBN IN DT JJ NN NN TO VB NNS VB CD JJ NNS IN DT JJ NN JJ IN `` NN VBZ NN '' .
I see the merit in flowing with duality .	PRP VBP DT NN IN VBG IN NN .
One of my most cherished dualities is the understanding that we are both autonomous individuals with the power to shape our personal destinies and at the same time we are all one , that there is no separation between you and I , we are all together in this thing called life , we human beings , the birds and the tress , the rocks and the sky , all of it .	CD IN PRP$ RBS VBN NNS VBZ DT NN IN PRP VBP RB JJ NNS IN DT NN TO VB PRP$ JJ NNS CC IN DT JJ NN PRP VBP RB CD , IN EX VBZ DT NN IN PRP CC PRP , PRP VBP RB RB IN DT NN VBN NN , PRP JJ NNS , DT NNS CC DT NNS , DT NNS CC DT NN , DT IN PRP .
I have written a lot recently about healing the self so today here are a few words on healing our collective body , mind and soul .	PRP VBP VBN DT NN RB IN VBG DT NN RB NN RB VBP DT JJ NNS IN VBG PRP$ JJ NN , NN CC NN .
Think of all life , if you will , as one great choir or one grand congregation .	VB IN DT NN , IN PRP MD , IN CD JJ NN CC CD JJ NN .
Our strength is in our unity and harmony .	PRP$ NN VBZ IN PRP$ NN CC NN .
Any major dischord and we all suffer .	DT JJ NN CC PRP DT VBP .
Any insult to the collective good brings us all down .	DT NN IN DT JJ NN VBZ PRP DT RB .
Living out of synch with nature is the great disease , from that flows all the tributaries we have come to think of as sickness .	VBG IN IN NN IN NN VBZ DT JJ NN , IN DT VBZ PDT DT NNS PRP VBP VBN TO VB IN IN NN .
We are only as strong as our weakest , we are only as healthy as the sickest amongst us - playing sports and being in the army taught me that lesson before I was finished being a teenager .	PRP VBP RB RB JJ IN PRP$ JJS , PRP VBP RB RB JJ IN DT JJS IN PRP , VBG NNS CC VBG IN DT NN VBD PRP DT NN IN PRP VBD JJ VBG DT NN .
When the healthy treat the sick with scorn and intolerance it brings us all down .	WRB DT JJ VBP DT NN IN NN CC NN PRP VBZ PRP DT RB .
When those lucky enough not to have Herpes create a climate of shame and indignity for those of us who do , not only are they hurting us , but they are hurting themselves .	WRB DT JJ RB RB TO VB NN VBP DT NN IN NN CC NN IN DT IN PRP WP VBP , RB RB VBP PRP VBG PRP , CC PRP VBP VBG PRP .
There is no escape from the collective ocean we all swim in .	EX VBZ DT NN IN DT JJ NN PRP DT VBP IN .
What you project will always come back to either reward or haunt you .	WP PRP VBP MD RB VB RB TO CC VB CC VB PRP .
We are now suffering from the consequences of our rape of the environment , our rejection of the natural for the industrial , and our embrace of violence over peace .	PRP VBP RB VBG IN DT NNS IN PRP$ NN IN DT NN , PRP$ NN IN DT JJ IN DT JJ , CC PRP$ NN IN NN IN NN .
Jesus said that what you do the least of the people you do to him .	NNP VBD IN WP PRP VBP DT JJS IN DT NNS PRP VBP IN PRP .
What are you doing to the least of the people ?	WP VBP PRP VBG IN DT JJS IN DT NNS .
If we are all in this thing together , let 's play nice .	IN PRP VBP RB IN DT NN RB , VB PRP VB RB .
Remember that what you do to yourself affects me and everybody else , remember that what you do to me and anyone else shapes your destiny .	VB IN WP PRP VBP IN PRP VBZ PRP CC NN JJ , VB IN WP PRP VBP IN PRP CC NN JJ VBZ PRP$ NN .
No matter what progress we make as individuals in becoming healthier , we will never achieve real health until we collectively decide to create a healthier reality .	RB RB WDT NN PRP VBP IN NNS IN VBG JJR , PRP MD RB VB JJ NN IN PRP RB VBP TO VB DT JJR NN .
Fortunately circumstances will force our hand soon since our collective bad behaviour can not continue indefinitely .	RB NNS MD VB PRP$ NN RB IN PRP$ JJ JJ NN MD RB VB RB .
In the near future collective choices will need to be made .	IN DT JJ NN JJ NNS MD VB TO VB VBN .
Will we choose to live in harmony with this planet or crash and burn in a conflagration of arrogance and disregard ?	MD PRP VB TO VB IN NN IN DT NN CC VB CC VB IN DT NN IN NN CC NN .
Will we choose to rise about prejudice and intolerance or go down kicking and screaming with holding on to fear and anger ?	MD PRP VB TO VB IN NN CC NN CC VB RB VBG CC VBG IN VBG RP IN NN CC NN .
There is no health without peace and no peace without health .	EX VBZ DT NN IN NN CC DT NN IN NN .

Kaoshikii is a dance which was invented in 1978 by Shrii Shrii A'nandamu'rti .	NN VBZ DT NN WDT VBD VBN IN CD IN NNP NNP NNP .
It is a psycho-spiritual exercise and benefiting the mind by developing stamina and strength .	PRP VBZ DT JJ NN CC VBG DT NN IN VBG NN CC NN .
Kaoshikii is especially good for women .	NN VBZ RB JJ IN NNS .

Kaoshikii comes from the Sanskrit word ' kosa ' meaning shell or layer of mind .	NN VBZ IN DT NNP NN `` NN '' VBG NN CC NN IN NN .
The self of the individual lies hidden in the innermost layers of existence ( kosas ) .	DT NN IN DT NN VBZ VBN IN DT JJ NNS IN NN -LRB- NNS -RRB- .

The Dance	DT NN
The eighteen steps of the dance are done rhythmically .	DT CD NNS IN DT NN VBP VBN RB .
First the dancer begins in the starting position : the hands together and raised over the head .	RB DT NN VBZ IN DT NN NN : DT NNS RB CC VBN IN DT NN .
Then to the beat of " dhin , dhin , ... , ta' , ta' " , the dancers begin their step , placing the big toe behind the heel of the other foot .	RB IN DT NN IN `` UH , UH , , , UH , UH '' , DT NNS VBP PRP$ NN , VBG DT JJ NN IN DT NN IN DT JJ NN .
In the final two steps , the dancers firmly stamp their feet on the ground .	IN DT JJ CD NNS , DT NNS RB VBP PRP$ NNS IN DT NN .
Kaoshikii can be danced for as many rounds as you like .	NN MD VB VBN IN RB JJ NNS IN PRP VBP .

Quebecker wins U.S. bravery award	NNP VBZ NNP NN NN
Pittsburgh -	NNP NFP
A Quebec man was awarded a Carnegie Medal for bravery on Monday for saving two friends by fighting off a polar bear with a pocket knife two years ago on Baffin Island	DT NNP NN VBD VBN DT NNP NNP IN NN IN NNP IN VBG CD NNS IN VBG RP DT JJ NN IN DT NN NN CD NNS RB IN NNP NNP
Dr. Eric Fortier , 34 , of Gatineau , Que. , used a pocket knife to attack a polar bear on Baffin Island , just south of the Arctic Circle , to save two friends who were being mauled .	NNP NNP NNP , CD , IN NNP , NNP , VBD DT NN NN TO VB DT JJ NN IN NNP NNP , RB RB IN DT NNP NNP , TO VB CD NNS WP VBD VBG VBN .
" All of the research and all of the preparation I did leading up to the trip gave no indication that there were bears in the Soper [ River ] valley where we were canoeing , " Dr. Fortier said .	`` DT IN DT NN CC DT IN DT NN PRP VBD VBG RP IN DT NN VBD DT NN IN EX VBD NNS IN DT NNP -LRB- NNP -RRB- NN WRB PRP VBD VBG , '' NNP NNP VBD .
Dr. Fortier , an orthodontist , learned there was at least one polar bear in the central region of Baffin Island in July 2001 when he felt what he thought was a dog leaning on his tent wall .	NNP NNP , DT NN , VBD EX VBD RB RBS CD JJ NN IN DT JJ NN IN NNP NNP IN NNP CD WRB PRP VBD WP PRP VBD VBD DT NN VBG IN PRP$ NN NN .
" My first thought was to push it away , " he said .	`` PRP$ JJ NN VBD TO VB PRP RB , '' PRP VBD .
" A few seconds later my girlfriend saw the shadow of a bear 's paw through the tent fly and then it started ripping through the ceiling . "	`` DT JJ NNS RB PRP$ NN VBD DT NN IN DT NN POS NN IN DT NN NN CC RB PRP VBD VBG IN DT NN . ''
The polar bear is more dangerous than most other bears .	DT JJ NN VBZ RBR JJ IN JJS JJ NNS .
The latter usually consider human beings a threat but the polar bear considers humans a snack , experts said .	DT JJ RB VBP JJ NNS DT NN CC DT JJ NN VBZ NNS DT NN , NNS VBD .
The two screamed to frighten the bear and warn their friends in a tent several metres away but the bear ripped into that tent and began mauling 31 - year - old Alain Parenteau .	DT CD VBD TO VB DT NN CC VB PRP$ NNS IN DT NN JJ NNS RB CC DT NN VBD IN DT NN CC VBD VBG CD HYPH NN HYPH JJ NNP NNP .
" Their screams changed , " Dr. Fortier said .	`` PRP$ NNS VBD , '' NNP NNP VBD .
" I grabbed my glasses and my knife and unzipped my tent and headed out . "	`` PRP VBD PRP$ NNS CC PRP$ NN CC VBD PRP$ NN CC VBD RB . ''
The bear dwarfed the 6 - foot - 1 Mr. Parenteau , knocking him to the ground , he said .	DT NN VBD DT CD HYPH NN HYPH CD NNP NNP , VBG PRP IN DT NN , PRP VBD .
Dr. Fortier threw a large rock at the bear , distracting it and allowing Parenteau to escape but it then turned on 25 - year - old Patricia Doyon , who was in the same tent .	NNP NNP VBD DT JJ NN IN DT NN , VBG PRP CC VBG NNP TO VB CC PRP RB VBD IN CD HYPH NN HYPH JJ NNP NNP , WP VBD IN DT JJ NN .
Again Dr. Fortier threw rocks at the bear and again its target was able to escape .	RB NNP NNP VBD NNS IN DT NN CC RB PRP$ NN VBD JJ TO VB .
" The bear gave chase and I gave chase , " he said .	`` DT NN VBD NN CC PRP VBD NN , '' PRP VBD .
" At some point , Patricia tripped or the bear tripped her and was at her back .	`` IN DT NN , NNP VBD CC DT NN VBD PRP CC VBD IN PRP$ NN .
I was beside the bear 's head and I stabbed it with an upper cut below the jaw in the neck a couple of times . "	PRP VBD IN DT NN POS NN CC PRP VBD PRP IN DT JJ NN IN DT NN IN DT NN DT NN IN NNS . ''
The bear ran off .	DT NN VBD RB .
While there was some fur and blood on the nine - centimetre blade , Dr. Fortier said he does n't think he hurt the bear badly .	IN EX VBD DT NN CC NN IN DT CD HYPH NN NN , NNP NNP VBD PRP VBZ RB VB PRP VBD DT NN RB .
Both Mr. Parenteau and Ms. Doyon , however , were bleeding badly .	CC NNP NNP CC NNP NNP , RB , VBD VBG RB .
Dr. Fortier and his girlfriend lashed two canoes together and paddled eight kilometres along the Soper River .	NNP NNP CC PRP$ NN VBD CD NNS RB CC VBD CD NNS IN DT NNP NNP .
Dr. Fortier travelled another three kilometres by foot to seek help in the nearest settlement .	NNP NNP VBD DT CD NNS IN NN TO VB NN IN DT JJS NN .
Both Mr. Parenteau and Ms. Doyon were airlifted to a hospital and survived , though Mr. Parenteau had a gash within a centimetre of his jugular , Dr. Fortier said .	CC NNP NNP CC NNP NNP VBD VBN IN DT NN CC VBD , IN NNP NNP VBD DT NN IN DT NN IN PRP$ NN , NNP NNP VBD .
Dr. Fortier was one of 15 people to receive the Carnegie Medal on Monday .	NNP NNP VBD CD IN CD NNS TO VB DT NNP NNP IN NNP .
The bronze medal is given to people who " risk their lives to an extraordinary degree while saving or attempting to save the lives of others . "	DT NN NN VBZ VBN IN NNS WP `` VBP PRP$ NNS IN DT JJ NN IN VBG CC VBG TO VB DT NNS IN NNS . ''
The other Canadian recipient of the medal was Ronald Joseph Crawford , 42 , of Hamilton , who was killed Aug. 4 , 2002 , while trying to defend a Hamilton sandwich shop owner from a robber wielding a knife . ORACLE	NNP
Larry Ellison and Bob Oats were working on a consulting project for the CIA ( Central Intelligence Agency ) .	NNP NNP CC NNP NNP VBD VBG IN DT NN NN IN DT NNP -LRB- NNP NNP NNP -RRB- .

Subject : Re : NASA IS A WASTE !	NN : IN : NNP VBZ DT NN .

Hello yheggy - ga ,	UH NNP HYPH NNP ,
On September 21 , 2004 , the U.S. Senate Appropriations Committee approved $ 16.379 billion in funding for NASA for fiscal year 2005 .	IN NNP CD , CD , DT NNP NNP NNPS NNP VBD $ CD CD IN NN IN NNP IN JJ NN CD .
This is a $ 200 million increase over what NASA received for fiscal year 2004 .	DT VBZ DT $ CD CD NN IN WP NNP VBD IN JJ NN CD .
U.S. Senate Committee on Appropriations	NNP NNP NNP IN NNPS
Press Release	NN NN
September 21 , 2004	NNP CD , CD
" National Aeronautics and Space Administration ( NASA ) : is funded at $ 16.379 billion , an increase of $ 200 million over the FY04 enacted level , and a reduction of $ 665 million from the budget request .	`` NNP NNPS CC NNP NNP -LRB- NNP -RRB- : VBZ VBN IN $ CD CD , DT NN IN $ CD CD IN DT NN VBN NN , CC DT NN IN $ CD CD IN DT NN NN .

By Richard Spencer	IN NNP NNP
( Filed : 19/11/2004 )	-LRB- VBN : CD -RRB-
China 's insatiable demand for energy is prompting fears of financial and diplomatic collisions around the globe as it seeks reliable supplies of oil from as far away as Brazil and Sudan .	NNP POS JJ NN IN NN VBZ VBG NNS IN JJ CC JJ NNS IN DT NN IN PRP VBZ JJ NNS IN NN IN RB RB RB IN NNP CC NNP .
An intrusion into Japanese territorial waters by a Chinese nuclear submarine last week and a trade deal with Brazil are the latest apparently unconnected consequences of China 's soaring economic growth .	DT NN IN JJ JJ NNS IN DT JJ JJ NN JJ NN CC DT NN NN IN NNP VBP DT JJS RB JJ NNS IN NNP POS VBG JJ NN .
Increased car usage in China is creating a high demand for petrol	VBN NN NN IN NNP VBZ VBG DT JJ NN IN NN
The connection , however , lies in an order issued last year by President Hu Jintao to seek secure oil supplies abroad - preferably ones which could not be stopped by America in case of conflict over Taiwan .	DT NN , RB , VBZ IN DT NN VBN JJ NN IN NNP NNP NNP TO VB JJ NN NNS RB , RB NNS WDT MD RB VB VBN IN NNP IN NN IN NN IN NNP .
The submarine incident was put down to a " technical error " by the Chinese government , which apologised to Japan .	DT NN NN VBD VBN RP IN DT `` JJ NN '' IN DT JJ NN , WDT VBD IN NNP .
But even before the incident the People 's Daily , the government mouthpiece , had commented that competition over the East China Sea between the two countries was " only a prelude of the game between China and Japan in the arena of international energy " .	CC RB IN DT NN DT NNPS POS NNP , DT NN NN , VBD VBN IN NN IN DT NNP NNP NNP IN DT CD NNS VBD `` RB DT NN IN DT NN IN NNP CC NNP IN DT NN IN JJ NN '' .
The Brazil trade deal included funding for a joint oil - drilling and pipeline programme at a cost that experts said would add up to three times the cost of simply buying oil on the market .	DT NNP NN NN VBD NN IN DT JJ NN HYPH NN CC NN NN IN DT NN WDT NNS VBD MD VB RP IN CD NNS DT NN IN RB VBG NN IN DT NN .
The West , however , has paid little attention to these developments .	DT NN , RB , VBZ VBN JJ NN IN DT NNS .
For the United States and Europe are far more concerned with the even more sensitive issues of China 's relations with " pariah states " .	CC DT NNP NNP CC NNP VBP RB RBR JJ IN DT RB RBR JJ NNS IN NNP POS NNS IN `` NN NNS '' .
In September , China threatened to veto any move to impose sanctions on Sudan over the atrocities in Darfur .	IN NNP , NNP VBD TO VB DT NN TO VB NNS IN NNP IN DT NNS IN NNP .
It has invested $ 3 billion in the African country 's oil industry , which supplies it with seven per cent of its needs .	PRP VBZ VBN $ CD CD IN DT JJ NN POS NN NN , WDT VBZ PRP IN CD NN NN IN PRP$ NNS .
Then , this month , it said that it opposed moves to refer Iran 's nuclear stand - off with the International Atomic Energy Agency to the United Nations Security Council .	RB , DT NN , PRP VBD IN PRP VBD NNS TO VB NNP POS JJ NN HYPH NN IN DT NNP NNP NNP NNP IN DT NNP NNP NNP NNP .
A week before , China 's second biggest state oil firm had signed a $ 70 billion deal for oilfield and natural gas development with Iran , which already supplies 13 per cent of China 's needs .	DT NN RB , NNP POS RB JJS NN NN NN VBD VBN DT $ CD CD NN IN NN CC JJ NN NN IN NNP , WDT RB VBZ CD NN NN IN NNP POS NNS .
China has its own reserves of oil and natural gas and once was a net oil exporter .	NNP VBZ PRP$ JJ NNS IN NN CC JJ NN CC RB VBD DT JJ NN NN .
But as its economy has expanded by an average of nine per cent per year for the last two decades , so has its demand for energy .	CC IN PRP$ NN VBZ VBN IN DT NN IN CD NN NN IN NN IN DT JJ CD NNS , RB VBZ PRP$ NN IN NN .
This year it overtook Japan as the world 's second largest consumer of energy , behind the US .	DT NN PRP VBD NNP IN DT NN POS RB JJS NN IN NN , IN DT NNP .
Its projected demand , boosted by a huge rise in car ownership as well as the need to find alternatives to polluting coal for electricity generation , has contributed to the surge in the price of oil this year .	PRP$ VBN NN , VBN IN DT JJ NN IN NN NN RB RB IN DT NN TO VB NNS IN VBG NN IN NN NN , VBZ VBN IN DT NN IN DT NN IN NN DT NN .
Shortages are already leading to power cuts in the big cities .	NNS VBP RB VBG IN NN NNS IN DT JJ NNS .
Since President Hu ordered state - owned oil firms to " go abroad " to ensure supply , they have begun drilling for gas in the East China Sea , just west of the line that Japan regards as its border .	IN NNP NNP VBD NN HYPH VBN NN NNS TO `` VB RB '' TO VB NN , PRP VBP VBN VBG IN NN IN DT NNP NNP NNP , RB RB IN DT NN WDT NNP VBZ IN PRP$ NN .
Japan protested , to no avail , that the project should be a joint one .	NNP VBD , IN DT NN , IN DT NN MD VB DT JJ NN .
The two are also set to clash over Russia 's oil wealth .	DT CD VBP RB JJ TO VB IN NNP POS NN NN .
China is furious that Japan has outbid it in their battle to determine the route of the pipeline that Russia intends to build to the Far East .	NNP VBZ JJ IN NNP VBZ VBN PRP IN PRP$ NN TO VB DT NN IN DT NN WDT NNP VBZ TO VB IN DT NNP NNP .
Japan favoured a route to the sea , enabling oil to be shipped to both Japan and China .	NNP VBD DT NN IN DT NN , VBG NN TO VB VBN IN CC NNP CC NNP .
China wanted an overland route through its own territory , which would give it ultimate control if hostilities broke out .	NNP VBD DT JJ NN IN PRP$ JJ NN , WDT MD VB PRP JJ NN IN NNS VBD RP .
Increasingly , analysts are saying that China 's efforts have gone beyond what is safe or even in its own interests .	RB , NNS VBP VBG IN NNP POS NNS VBP VBN IN WP VBZ JJ CC RB IN PRP$ JJ NNS .
Claude Mandil , the executive director of the International Energy Agency in Paris , said the reserves in the East China Sea were hardly worth the trouble .	NNP NNP , DT JJ NN IN DT NNP NNP NNP IN NNP , VBD DT NNS IN DT NNP NNP NNP VBD RB JJ DT NN .
" Nobody thinks that there will be a lot of oil and gas in this part of the world , " he said .	`` NN VBZ IN EX MD VB DT NN IN NN CC NN IN DT NN IN DT NN , '' PRP VBD .
" It may be a difficult political issue but I do n't think the energy content is worthwhile . "	`` PRP MD VB DT JJ JJ NN CC PRP VBP RB VB DT NN NN VBZ JJ . ''
Eurasia Group , a New York - based firm of political analysts , said its oil experts worked out that China was paying such an inflated price for its investment in Brazil that the cost for the oil it ended up with was three times the market price .	NNP NNP , DT NNP NNP HYPH VBN NN IN JJ NNS , VBD PRP$ NN NNS VBD RP IN NNP VBD VBG PDT DT VBN NN IN PRP$ NN IN NNP IN DT NN IN DT NN PRP VBD RP IN VBD CD NNS DT NN NN .

China 's wider aggression to secure oil and gas was the greatest threat to its international standing in the next decade .	NNP POS JJ NN TO VB NN CC NN VBD DT JJS NN IN PRP$ JJ NN IN DT JJ NN .
" Sudan is the primary example , " he said .	`` NNP VBZ DT JJ NN , '' PRP VBD .

Visualisations can be as useful tools , but meditation is more than that .	NNS MD VB IN JJ NNS , CC NN VBZ JJR IN DT .
Meditation has to do with what is called ideation .	NN VBZ TO VB IN WP VBZ VBN NN .
It is always good to stick to a formal intense meditation practice like the one for beginners described in the MP3 file that follows after the visualisations .	PRP VBZ RB JJ TO VB IN DT JJ JJ NN NN IN DT NN IN NNS VBN IN DT NN NN WDT VBZ IN DT NNS .
Find a comfortable place on the floor and sit with your legs crossed .	VB DT JJ NN IN DT NN CC VB IN PRP$ NNS VBN .
Place your hands one on top of the other in your lap , keep your back straight , keep eyes closed and keep tongue on the roof of your mouth .	VB PRP$ NNS CD IN NN IN DT JJ IN PRP$ NN , VB PRP$ NN JJ , VB NNS VBN CC VB NN IN DT NN IN PRP$ NN .
Your breathing should be calm and relaxed , through the nose .	PRP$ NN MD VB JJ CC JJ , IN DT NN .
Spend a minute or so concentrating on your breath , feeling the air flowing through your nostrils .	VB DT NN CC RB VBG IN PRP$ NN , VBG DT NN VBG IN PRP$ NNS .
1 . Warm Sun Visualization	LS . JJ NN NN
Continue to breathe slowly and deeply .	VB TO VB RB CC RB .
With each breath , feel the muscles in your body becoming lighter and lighter , and also your external motor and sensory organs are feeling like they are withdrawing from the world into a special inner quietness . The golden rays feel soft and soothing .	DT JJ NNS VBP JJ CC JJ .
Now you are far above the earth - into space .	RB PRP VBP RB IN DT NN , IN NN .
Everything around you is so vast .	NN IN PRP VBZ RB JJ .

Now imagine that infinite happiness is surrounding you in every direction .	RB VB IN JJ NN VBZ VBG PRP IN DT NN .
Feel you 're completely surrounded by that infinite peace and happiness .	VB PRP VBP RB VBN IN DT JJ NN CC NN .
Now start to repeat within your mind the mantra : BABA NAM KEVALAM .	RB VB TO VB IN PRP$ NN DT NN : NN NN NN .
Its meaning is " Infinite happiness is everywhere " .	PRP$ NN VBZ `` JJ NN VBZ RB '' .
Feel the meaning , do n't just think of its wordy meaning or try to translate from Sanskrit ( BABA NAM KEVALAM ) to an English meaning ( Infinite peace and happiness ) .	VB DT NN , VB RB RB VB IN PRP$ JJ NN CC VB TO VB IN NNP -LRB- NN NN NN -RRB- IN DT JJ NN -LRB- JJ NN CC NN -RRB- .
Think internally , intuitively , not by words , of the meaning , as you 're repeating it .	VB RB , RB , RB IN NNS , IN DT NN , IN PRP VBP VBG PRP .
This is called ideation .	DT VBZ VBN NN .
It is important to take the idea , not just the intellectual analysis .	PRP VBZ JJ TO VB DT NN , RB RB DT JJ NN .
Touching deep into the idea is what builds intuition - it is a synthetic process .	VBG RB IN DT NN VBZ WP VBZ NN , PRP VBZ DT JJ NN .
Whereas , trying to translate and grapple with wordy meanings is an intellectual mechanism - an analytical process .	RB , VBG TO VB CC VB IN JJ NNS VBZ DT JJ NN , DT JJ NN .
Feel you 're surrounded by infinite peace and happiness , and feel that your own sense of existence is in direct contact with that endless peace and happiness all around you .	VB PRP VBP VBN IN JJ NN CC NN , CC VB IN PRP$ JJ NN IN NN VBZ IN JJ NN IN DT JJ NN CC NN RB IN PRP .
You can go further and feel that your unit consciousness , a dot in the Infinite Consciousness , is merging with Infinity .	PRP MD VB RB CC VB IN PRP$ NN NN , DT NN IN DT JJ NN , VBZ VBG IN NN .
Continue for as long as you like , then open your eyes .	VB IN RB RB IN PRP VBP , RB VB PRP$ NNS .
OK that is fairly basic :) .	UH DT VBZ RB JJ NFP .
The important point is to develop some psycho-spiritual connection between your mind and the universal Consciousness or Supreme Consciousness .	DT JJ NN VBZ TO VB DT JJ NN IN PRP$ NN CC DT JJ NN CC JJ NN .
Do n't worry if you have trouble concentrating on the mantra and ideation - that 's normal .	VB RB VB IN PRP VBP NN VBG IN DT NN CC NN , DT VBZ JJ .
It takes some time and practice to be able to focus on the one thought .	PRP VBZ DT NN CC NN TO VB JJ TO VB IN DT CD NN .
The main thing is to keep practicing .	DT JJ NN VBZ TO VB VBG .
If you do n't practice , then nothing happens .	IN PRP VBP RB VB , RB NN VBZ .
Well maybe a miracle could happen , but let s face it we 're ordinary people and so require practical day to day techniques !	UH RB DT NN MD VB , CC VB PRP VB PRP PRP VBP JJ NNS CC RB VBP JJ NN IN NN NNS .

NORTH CAROLINA RELIGIOUS COALITION FOR MARRIAGE EQUALITY	NNP NNP NNP NNP IN NNP NNP
From what we hear from the news media , one could easily conclude that all Christians are opposed to gay marriage .	IN WP PRP VBP IN DT NN NN , CD MD RB VB IN DT NNPS VBP JJ IN JJ NN .
But that ’s not the case .	CC DT VBZ RB DT NN .
Last year an organization named the North Carolina Religious Coalition for Marriage Equality was formed to get out the message that at least some people of faith are not opposed to extending the rights and responsibilities of civil marriage to same - gender couples .	JJ NN DT NN VBN DT NNP NNP NNP NNP IN NNP NNP VBD VBN TO VB RB DT NN IN RB RBS DT NNS IN NN VBP RB JJ IN VBG DT NNS CC NNS IN JJ NN IN JJ HYPH NN NNS .

CD IN `` NNP POS '' JJ NNS VBZ TO VB NNS IN DT VBN `` NN IN JJ NNS , '' WDT VBZ VBN CC MD RB VB VBN IN NNS IN DT NNP NN .
It presents the case for marriage equality and states , “ We are resolved that the State should not interfere with same - gender couples who choose to marry and share fully and equally in the rights , responsibilities , and commitments of civil marriage . ”	PRP VBZ DT NN IN NN NN CC VBZ , `` PRP VBP VBN IN DT NNP MD RB VB IN JJ HYPH NN NNS WP VBP TO VB CC VB RB CC RB IN DT NNS , NNS , CC NNS IN JJ NN . ''
A measure to amend the NC Constitution to ban gay marriage was defeated last year but already has been reintroduced in the 2005 legislative session , so there is a real need for visible support for the “ pro-same - gender - marriage ” side of this issue .
